description: With the Scheduled trigger, you can initiate customized workflows at specific time intervals.
name: schedule
title: Schedule

triggers.description: Trigger off at a specific time either on a daily basis or selected days of the week.
triggers.name: everyDay

properties.description: The exact date and time when the trigger was activated, formatted according to the specified timezone.
properties.name: fireTime

properties.description: The date and time when the trigger was activated.
properties.name: datetime

properties.description: The hour of the day (0-23) at which the workflow was set to trigger.
properties.name: hour

properties.description: The minute of the hour (0-59) at which the workflow was set to trigger.
properties.name: minute

properties.description: The specific days of the week (represented as integers) on which the workflow was set to trigger.
properties.name: dayOfWeek

properties.description: The timezone used for scheduling the cron expression, ensuring the trigger fires at the correct local time.
properties.name: timezone

triggers.title: Every Month

triggers.description: Trigger off periodically, for example every minute or day, based on a set interval.
triggers.name: interval

properties.description: The exact date and time when the trigger was activated, formatted according to the specified timezone.
properties.name: fireTime

properties.description: The date and time when the trigger was activated.
properties.name: datetime

properties.description: The interval value that determines how frequently the workflow is triggered, based on the selected time unit.
properties.name: interval

properties.description: The unit of time (e.g., minute, hour, day, month) used in conjunction with the interval to schedule the trigger.
properties.name: timeUnit

properties.description: The exact date and time when the trigger was activated, formatted according to the specified timezone.
properties.name: fireTime

properties.description: The date and time when the trigger was activated.
properties.name: datetime

properties.description: The interval value that determines how frequently the workflow is triggered, based on the selected time unit.
properties.name: interval

properties.description: The unit of time (e.g., minute, hour, day, month) used in conjunction with the interval to schedule the trigger.
properties.name: timeUnit

properties.description: Specifies the frequency at which the workflow is triggered, based on the selected time unit. For example, an interval of 5 with a time unit of 'Minute' triggers the workflow every 5 minutes.
properties.label: Interval
properties.name: interval

properties.description: Specifies the unit of time used in conjunction with the interval to determine the frequency of workflow triggers.
properties.label: Time Unit
properties.name: timeUnit

triggers.title: Interval

triggers.description: Trigger off based on a custom schedule.
triggers.name: cron

properties.description: The exact date and time when the trigger was activated, formatted according to the specified timezone.
properties.name: fireTime

properties.description: The date and time when the trigger was activated.
properties.name: datetime

properties.description: The cron schedule expression that defines the timing pattern for triggering the workflow.
properties.name: expression

properties.description: The timezone used for scheduling the cron expression, ensuring the trigger fires at the correct local time.
properties.name: timezone

properties.description: The exact date and time when the trigger was activated, formatted according to the specified timezone.
properties.name: fireTime

properties.description: The date and time when the trigger was activated.
properties.name: datetime

properties.description: The cron schedule expression that defines the timing pattern for triggering the workflow.
properties.name: expression

properties.description: The timezone used for scheduling the cron expression, ensuring the trigger fires at the correct local time.
properties.name: timezone

properties.description: The chron schedule expression. Format: [Minute] [Hour] [Day of Month] [Month] [Day of Week]
properties.label: Expression
properties.name: expression

properties.description: The timezone at which the cron expression will be scheduled.
properties.label: Timezone
properties.name: timezone
